column5: I like to think of Kevin from Home Alone saying "Shut Up" to the creepy furnace in his basement when my intrusive thoughts come about. Puts some humor in my hell.

I feel you. I have severe anxiety around this time. I think I have PMDD too, but haven't been diagnosed. I go into a panicky state and constantly worry I'm hurting my husband. Keep strong and know there are good days ahead. Try to think of those days before you!
